rescuecore2.misc.java

Class JavaTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.misc.java.JavaTools

  • public final class JavaTools
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of useful functions related to the Java language.

    • Method Detail

      • instantiate

        public static <T> T instantiate(java.lang.String className,
                java.lang.Class<T> outputClass)
        Instantiate a class by reflection. This method will not throw exceptions but will return null on error.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The desired return type.
        Parameters:
        className - The class name to instantiate.
        outputClass - The class that specifies the type that should be returned. This will usually be a superclass of the given class name.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the given class name cast as the output class, or null if the class cannot be instantiated.

      • instantiateFactory

        public static <T> T instantiateFactory(java.lang.String classname,
                       java.lang.Class<T> outputClass)
        Instantiate a factory class by reflection. Essentially the same as instantiate(String, Class) except that it will look for a static field called INSTANCE that contains an instance of the right class. If this doesn't exist (or in inaccessable or the wrong type) then a constructor will be used.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The desired return type.
        Parameters:
        classname - The class name to instantiate.
        outputClass - The class that specifies the type that should be returned. This will usually be a superclass of the given class name.
        Returns:
        The content of the INSTANCE field if it exists; a new instance of the given class name cast as the output class, or null if the class cannot be instantiated.
